UNICEF Podcast.name: UNICEF Podcast
UNICEF Podcast.desc: A new global radio service from UNICEF focusing on the health, education, equality and protection of children. Hosted by Blue Chevigny with UNICEF correspondents from around the globe.

Declarations: The Human Rights Podcast.name: Declarations: The Human Rights Podcast
Declarations: The Human Rights Podcast.desc: Declarations is the Cambridge human rights podcast coming to you every week from the Centre of Governance and Human Rights. Tune in each Monday as our panel explores the rights and wrongs of contemporary politics, joined by fascinating guests from the University of Cambridge and around the world. (All rights reserved, so to speak. Our theme song, "Relative Dimensions", was created by the artificial intelligence at JukeDeck.)

Global Development.name: Global Development
Global Development.desc: Every month we’ll explore the key issues affecting billions of people across the developing world. This podcast asks the big questions facing international development. Recent editions have looked at why 75 million of the world’s poorest children can’t access education, why El Nino has worsened the food shortages in Malawi and Zimbabwe and why big data offers new tools to help countries meet their development goals

Raoul Wallenberg Institute of Human Righ.name: Raoul Wallenberg Institute of Human Rights and Humanitarian Law
Raoul Wallenberg Institute of Human Righ.desc: Podcast by The Raoul Wallenberg Institute of Human Rights and Humanitarian Law
